mapper.select: select p.project_id, project_name, project_status, description, p.creation_time, deadline, p.creator_id, mark,u.user_name,t.team_id FROM team_member as tm INNER JOIN team AS t ON tm.team_id = t.team_id INNER JOIN project as p ON t.project_id = p.project_id INNER JOIN user as u on p.creator_id = u.user_id WHERE member_id=#{userId}
SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN `status` = '已完成' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100 as percents FROM task t INNER JOIN project p ON t.project_id = p.project_id WHERE p.project_id = #{projectId}
